steps.step_title: Carefully unpack the bare root tree from the container or material it came in.
If you do damage a few, nip them off with a pair of sterilized pruners.
Set the tree into a bucket filled with water.
Allow the tree to soak for 4-6 hours prior to planting.
Dig a hole slightly larger than the diameter and depth of the tree and soil width.
Check to be sure there are no large weed roots in the hole you have dug.
Add your organic material to the hole and mix well.
